attributes.action: Pull our troops out of Afghanistan and instead use the money saved to bolster our national security.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets stop wasting the lives of our brave soldiers, airmen and sailors, not to the mention the millions and millions of tax payers money to pay for this war. If this is a war on terror and there is such a risk to our home security then lets pull out our troops, stop wasting this money and use the money instead to bolster our border force, immigration services, intelligence services, our police forces and other security forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
